name: Method of Ambulation (Walking, Wheelchair, Both)
description: Does the patient ambulate and/or use a wheelchair mobility?
dependent: If ambulation is the only mode of mobility, code B5a for the longest distance completed
substantial: If WC is the only mode of mobility, code B5b for the longest distance completed
partial: If Both WC & ambulation are used for mobility, code both B5a & B5b
